name: Scenes from the Life of the Prodigal Son
description: Scenes from the Life of the Prodigal Son; Master of Saint Christopher (Flemish, active first half of 16th century); Netherlands; about 1530; Pen and brown ink and gray wash, over traces of black chalk; 19.2 x 51.4 cm (7 9/16 x 20 1/4 in.); 90.GG.7; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Scenes from the Life of the Prodigal Son
medium: Pen and brown ink and gray wash, over traces of black chalk
